item.title: 拜登考虑限制化石燃料融资，这可能会让特朗普长命百岁
item.description: 拜登政府正在权衡最后一搏，争取在巴黎关键会谈开始之前达成一项国际协议，限制对外国石油和天然气项目的资金支持。【原文：The Biden administration is weighing a last-ditch push for an international agreement that would restrict financial support for foreign oil and gas projects before critical talks start in Paris.】

item.title: 马斯克在财政部竞选中支持卢特尼克胜过贝森特
item.description: 亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）表示支持霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）竞选当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的下一任财政部长。【原文：Billionaire Elon Musk voiced support for Howard Lutnick in the race for President-elect Donald Trump’s next Treasury secretary, offering a late boost to the candidacy of the Cantor Fitzgerald LP CEO as the incoming cabinet takes shape.】

item.title: 微策略公司的 260 亿美元比特币缓存比 IBM 和耐克现金控股还要大
item.description: 迈克尔-赛勒（Michael Saylor）决定在微策略公司（MicroStrategy Inc.【原文：Michael Saylor’s unorthodox decision to hold Bitcoin instead of cash on MicroStrategy Inc.’s books has vaulted the once obscure software maker into the upper echelon of the wealthiest corporations when it comes to financial assets.】

item.title: 习近平宣布中国将于 2026 年主办亚太经合组织峰会
item.description: 国家主席习近平宣布，中国将于 2026 年主办亚太经济合作组织峰会，届时将有来自 21 个成员国的领导人参加，其中可能包括美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）。【原文：President Xi Jinping announced that China will host the Asia Pacific Economic Cooperation summit in 2026, which would bring leaders from the 21-member group — including potentially US President-elect Donald Trump — to the world’s second-biggest economy.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》称，TikTok 母公司字节跳动估值约 3000 亿美元
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周六报道，TikTok 的母公司字节跳动有限公司（ByteDance Ltd.）对自己的估值约为 3000 亿美元，这是中国科技公司有史以来最高的估值之一，即使该公司正在努力维持其流行的社交媒体应用在美国的存在。【原文：TikTok parent ByteDance Ltd. is valuing itself around $300 billion, one of the highest valuations ever for the Chinese tech company, even as it fights to maintain its popular social-media app’s presence in the US, the Wall Street Journal reported Saturday.】

item.title: 习近平和石破茂将在特朗普就任总统前促进中日关系
item.description: 中国国家主席习近平和日本首相石破茂在 10 月日本领导人就职以来的首次会晤中同意加强各层级的沟通。【原文：Chinese President Xi Jinping and Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba agreed to strengthen communication at all levels during their first meeting since the Japanese leader took office in October.】

item.title: 沙特抵制重申化石燃料承诺，COP29 冲突加剧
item.description: 在联合国气候谈判中，围绕各国是否应重新承诺履行去年做出的历史性承诺，即过渡到不使用化石燃料的阶段，一场争论正在酝酿之中。【原文：A fight is building at the United Nations climate talks over whether countries should recommit to last year’s historic pledge to transition away from fossil fuels.】

item.title: S&P 500 盈利前景恶化是股市反弹的坏兆头
item.description: 华尔街的分析师们正在迅速缩减对美国企业明年盈利增长的预测，这可能会在不久之后为股市的急速上涨踩下刹车。【原文：Wall Street analysts are quickly scaling back their forecasts for Corporate America’s earnings growth over the next year, which could pump the brakes on the blistering stock market rally before long.】

item.title: 挪威亿万富翁、房地产大亨奥拉夫-托恩（Olav Thon）逝世，享年101岁
item.description: 奥拉夫-托恩（Olav Thon）以毛皮贸易商起家，建立了一个房地产帝国，成为挪威最富有的人之一，现已去世，享年101岁。【原文：Olav Thon, who started out as a fur trader and built a property empire that made him one of Norway’s richest people, has died at 101.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》称中国黑客入侵 T-Mobile 网络
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》报道，在中国黑客最近对多家电信公司的攻击中，T-Mobile US Inc.【原文：T-Mobile US Inc.’s network was among those recently breached by Chinese hackers in an attack on multiple telecommunications companies, the Wall Street Journal reported.】

item.title: 从会议室争吵到上市准备就绪：Klarna 疯狂的一年
item.description: 今年，Klarna Group Plc 的董事会有时就像一出肥皂剧。【原文：At times, the boardroom drama inside Klarna Group Plc this year felt like a soap opera.】

item.title: 特朗普回国后，阿尔伯塔省力争向美国提供更多石油管道
item.description: 阿尔伯塔省政府一直在与国内能源公司商讨修建更多输往美国的石油出口管道，以利用即将上任的白宫政府对石油的友好态度。【原文：Alberta’s government has been talking with domestic energy companies about building more oil export pipelines to the US to take advantage of an incoming White House administration with a friendlier attitude toward oil.】

item.title: 尽管服务业强劲，欧洲央行行长金多斯仍对通胀充满信心
item.description: 欧洲中央银行副行长路易斯-德金多斯（Luis de Guindos）表示，尽管服务业的价格压力仍存在一些问题，但欧洲中央银行有信心明年的通胀率将接近 2% 的目标。【原文：The European Central Bank is confident inflation will converge with its 2% target next year, even if some questions over price pressures in services remain, according to Vice President Luis de Guindos.】

item.title: 被美欧冷落，南美将目光投向中国
item.description: 拉丁美洲本月将举办两次重要峰会。一个是亚太经合组织（APEC）论坛，另一个是 20 国集团。这两个论坛都是 20 世纪 80 年代末和 90 年代全球化鼎盛时期的产物。【原文：Latin America this month will have hosted two key summits. One is the Asia Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) forum, and the other is the Group of 20. Both are products of the heyday of globalization in the late 1980s and 1990s.】

item.title: 全球经济图表：美国通胀进展停滞
item.description: 事实证明，美国通胀顽固不化，而消费支出却没有出现任何令人担忧的放缓迹象，这为美联储采取更加谨慎的降息措施奠定了基础。【原文：US inflation is proving stubborn while consumer spending shows scant signs of any concerning slowdown, laying the groundwork for a more cautious approach to interest-rate cuts from the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 即使俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司切断了 OMV 的供应，俄罗斯天然气流量仍保持稳定
item.description: 俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司（Gazprom PJSC）在切断了其最长合作伙伴之一奥地利 OMV AG 的天然气供应后，仍在正常水平上通过乌克兰向欧洲输送天然气。【原文：Gazprom PJSC is sending natural gas to Europe via Ukraine at normal levels even after cutting off one of its longest partners, Austria’s OMV AG.】

item.title: 毛里求斯中央银行新行长期待遏制卢比下跌
item.description: 毛里求斯新任央行行长拉玛-西塔宁（Rama Sithanen）表示，他的首要任务是遏制卢比汇率下滑，解决国内市场外汇短缺问题。【原文：Mauritius’ new central bank Governor Rama Sithanen says his first priorities are combating the slide of the rupee and fixing a shortage of foreign currency in the domestic market.】

item.title: 德国未来领导人吹嘘他的增长奇迹秘诀
item.description: 对于希望成为总理的弗里德里希-梅尔茨来说，开启繁荣新时代的关键在于重新审视那些曾帮助推动德国战后经济奇迹的政策。【原文：For Chancellor-hopeful Friedrich Merz, the keys to unlocking a new era of prosperity lie in revisiting the policies that helped drive Germany’s postwar economic miracle.】

item.title: 斯塔默在特朗普改变的世界中谨慎前行
item.description: 当唐纳德-特朗普在赢得美国大选数小时后致电基尔-斯塔默时，他是通过英国首相的手机而不是唐宁街通常用于此类通话的安全座机打的电话。【原文：When Donald Trump called Keir Starmer hours after winning the US election, he did so via the UK prime minister’s mobile phone rather than the secure landline Downing Street typically uses for such conversations.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯王储 MBS 取消里约 20 国集团峰会之旅
item.description: 一位知情人士称，沙特阿拉伯实际统治者穆罕默德-本-萨勒曼王储已决定不出席下周在里约热内卢举行的 20 国集团峰会。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s de facto ruler Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman has decided not to attend next week’s Group of 20 summit in Rio de Janeiro, said a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 美国称比尔-黄（Bill Hwang）应因 Archegos 罪被判处 21 年监禁
item.description: Archegos 资本管理公司创始人 Bill Hwang 因欺诈和操纵市场导致其公司 2021 年大规模倒闭，应服刑 21 年。【原文：Archegos Capital Management founder Bill Hwang should serve 21 years behind bars for fraud and market manipulation that led to his firm’s massive 2021 collapse, prosecutors recommended ahead of his sentencing next week.】

item.title: 报道称印度医院火灾后新生儿恐将死亡
item.description: 据当地媒体报道，周五晚间，印度北部北方邦一家政府医院的新生儿科发生火灾，恐怕至少有 10 名新生儿死亡。【原文：At least 10 newborns are feared dead after a fire broke out at a neonatal unit of a government hospital in India’s northern Uttar Pradesh state on Friday night, according to local media reports.】

item.title: 央视称中国与欧盟在电动汽车谈判中达成 "技术共识
item.description: 据中国中央电视台下属的一个微博账户发布的消息称，中国和欧盟已在会谈中达成 "技术性共识"，旨在削减或撤销欧盟对中国制造的电动汽车征收的关税。【原文：China and the European Union have reached “technical consensus” in their talks aimed at scaling back or reversing tariffs that the bloc applied to China-made electric vehicles, according to a posting on a Weibo account affiliated with the state-run China Central Television.】

item.title: 万宜加强为超强台风，威胁菲律宾
item.description: 热带气旋 "曼怡 "已增强为超强台风，有可能给菲律宾的主要岛屿带来强降雨和巨浪。【原文：Tropical cyclone Man-yi has strengthened into a super typhoon, threatening to bring intense rains and high waves on the Philippines’ main island that’s still reeling from a string of storms in recent weeks.】

item.title: 艾伯塔省省长为提高 "中等 "回报率的 Aimco 清理行动辩护
item.description: 艾伯塔省省长达尼埃尔-史密斯（Danielle Smith）表示，她的政府计划最早在下周任命该省养老金管理机构的新董事会成员；这是为提高她所谓的 "中等收益 "而进行的一系列改革中的一步。【原文：Alberta Premier Danielle Smith said her government plans to name new board members for the provincial pension manager as early as next week — one step in a series of reforms to boost what she called “middling returns.”】

item.title: 面对特朗普，习近平扮演全球自由贸易捍卫者的角色
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普威胁要对全世界征收关税之际，习近平再次不失时机地将自己定位为国际贸易体系的首要捍卫者。【原文：As Donald Trump threatens to impose tariffs on the entire world, Xi Jinping is once again wasting no time in positioning himself as the premier defender of the international trading system.】

item.title: 中国的 "强势货币 "梦遭遇特朗普回归
item.description: 中国国家主席习近平希望拥有一种足够稳定的 "强势货币"，以便在全球贸易中发挥日益重要的作用。唐纳德-特朗普的回归似乎将挑战这一雄心。【原文：China’s President Xi Jinping wants a “powerful currency” that is stable enough to play a rising role in global trade. Donald Trump’s return looks set to challenge that ambition.】

item.title: 蒂森克虏伯部门主管表示，计划在一年内进行海洋业务 IPO
item.description: 蒂森克虏伯股份公司首席执行官在接受报纸采访时表示，在向私募股权公司凯雷集团（Carlyle Group Inc.【原文：Thyssenkrupp AG is planning an initial public offering of its naval shipbuilding unit within a year after plans to sell a majority stake to private equity firm Carlyle Group Inc. collapsed, the division’s chief executive officer said in a newspaper interview.】

item.title: 美联储主席柯林斯称，美国通胀率正以强劲势头向 2% 的目标迈进
item.description: 波士顿联邦储备银行行长苏珊-柯林斯（Susan Collins）表示，她认为通胀率将重回央行2%的目标，尽管数据可能会逐月波动。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Boston President Susan Collins said she sees inflation heading back to the central bank’s 2% goal even though the data may be volatile from month to month.】
